abstract: Verizon, which spends about $1.9 billion a year on advertising, will reduce its agency roster to 10 from more than 20.
snippet: Verizon, which spends about $1.9 billion a year on advertising, will reduce its agency roster to 10 from more than 20.
lead_paragraph: In one of the largest recent account consolidations, Verizon Communications is combining duties for its consumer and business services with assignments for Verizon Wireless to increase effectiveness and efficiency. Verizon, which spends about $1.9 billion a year on advertising, will reduce its agency roster to 10 from more than 20.

headline.main: Verizon Consolidates Agencies and Adds Wireless Assignments
